NAME: Brassbug Hive
EFECTS: {J} Create a [Brassbug 2/2/2] Robot token in target Expedition.  At Noon — Create a [Brassbug 2/2/2] Robot token in target Expedition.  When a Robot joins your Expeditions — It gains 1 boost.
LORE: What could possibly go wrong with an adorable little self-replicating autonomous robot?
